main.name: Claire Boals
main.description: I'm a software engineer and web developer, recently graduated from Tufts University, B.S. Computer Science
main.bio: I am a developer with experience across the stack on individual and team projects, with mostly in React, and I have a passion for learning new technologies. I love analyzing and solving problems, iterating on and improving software, and most of all, creating new things!
main.contactmessage: Want to get in contact? Shoot me a message!

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Web Programming, Computation Theory, Object-Oriented GUI, Machine Structure & Assembly Language

work.title: Self-Employed
work.description: Analyzed client needs to design and create websites using Shopify and WordPress, identified and instituted back-end tools to assist and track growth, effectively communicated all stages of development with clients at weekly meetings, provided support and educational demonstrations to assist clients in maintaining websites post-contract.

work.title: Tisch Library Digital Design Studio
work.description: Troubleshot and solved hardware and software issues, assisted patrons with designing and printing large format posters, maintained computer lab space and recording studio.

work.title: Tufts Technology Services
work.description: Diagnosed, troubleshot, and solved hardware and software-related issues for customers, communicated solutions thoroughly to each customer, documented all issues and resolutions in detail, escalated issues when necessary.

projects.title: MBTA Map
projects.category: Interactive MBTA map to show updated arrival/departure times.

projects.category: (offline now) Lyric search engine that returns playable Spotify links.

projects.category: Program written in C that compresses images by packing and unpacking binary data.
